author: bigz123
title: this is a good game!
review:
first of all o got this game from a walmart. i thought this wasnt goin to be good until i played it.

in this new game there are more levels that werent on the older ones!

and you can still mix characters.

i think lucas arts did a fine job with this video game.

author: wyoeaglefan
title: Only give it a 4 for being a repeat.
review: It was nice to relive the first Star Wars lego game on the 360. All the classic elements where there, and NO Undefeated achivements! I would recomend this game to any hardcore Star Wars lego fan, even if not for the fairly easy 1000 gamerscore. Traveler's Tales makes another hit.

author: legobagel
title: good game but too much to do
review:
i got this game for my birthday i was so excited when i got it the game is so fun but the problem is that theres why to much to do i had this game for a year and a half and ive not even completed it 50% now on to the pros and cons

pros:
the game is mainly combaine of lego star wars i and lego star wars ii
the game in total has 36 levels
lots of charaters to unlock
secerts levels
has flying levels
has my favorite level on the game mos espa pod race
cons:
too much too do
each episode has a level that horrilby sucks
how on earth do you unlock the bounty hunter levels
the achievment shoot first description dosent make sense
episode vi caniseters are hard to get in story mode
 overall a good game must buy
